de.fzi.replica.comm
Interface Connection.ConnectionContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionImpl.ConnectionContextImpl
Enclosing interface:
Connection
public static interface Connection.ConnectionContext

The context of a connection encapsulates all connection configuration data and provides access to Connection.ConnectionContext.ConnectionActivity objects.

Version:
0.1, 29.11.2010
Author:
Jan Novacek novacek@fzi.de

Nested Class Summary
static interface Connection.ConnectionContext.ConnectionActivity
          A connection activity is a list of ConnectionActivityStates.
